Token.Abstract: PFAnalytics provides an interface to Parse's logging and analytics backend.
Tracks this application being launched. If this happened as the result of the user opening a push notification, this method sends along information to correlate this open with that push.

Parameter.Name: launchOptions
Parameter.Abstract: The dictionary indicating the reason the application was launched, if any. This value can be found as a parameter to various UIApplicationDelegate methods, and can be empty or nil.

Token.Abstract: Tracks this application being launched. If this happened as the result of the user opening a push notification, this method sends along information to correlate this open with that push.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: The Remote Notification payload, if any. This value can be found either under UIApplicationLaunchOptionsRemoteNotificationKey on launchOptions, or as a parameter to application:didReceiveRemoteNotification:. This can be empty or nil.

Token.Abstract: Tracks the occurrence of a custom event. Parse will store a data point at the time of invocation with the given event name.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the custom event to report to Parse as having happened.

Token.Abstract: Tracks the occurrence of a custom event with additional dimensions. Parse will store a data point at the time of invocation with the given event name.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the custom event to report to Parse as having happened.

Parameter.Name: dimensions
Parameter.Abstract: The dictionary of information by which to segment this event.
